title: (x) Script on Wedding Paper Divas invitations - Corinthia {Michel Boyer}
content:
Hi there,  
Newbie lurker here. Im wondering if anyone can identify these two fonts:

[http://www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView\_271.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050330/http:/www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView_271.htm "http://www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView\_271.htm")

[http://www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView\_177.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022050330/http:/www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView_177.htm "http://www.weddingpaperdivas.com/products/ProductView\_177.htm")

Thanks for your help,  
Simone
author: simonie

comments.content: Hmm, their website says "Kate LT" where LT usually means Linotype, but no such thing on the Linotype website. It does remind me of Bickley Script. Also Tamarillo, though that is an upright script.
